
```{r,output_data,echo=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(formattable)

df_stocklist %>%
  mutate(
    Current = cell_spec(Current, bold = T),
    `Max2020 vs Min2020` = ifelse(`Max2020 vs Min2020` < 0,
                  color_tile("red", "white")(`Max2020 vs Min2020`),
                  color_tile("green", "white")(`Max2020 vs Min2020`)),
    `Max2020 vs Current` = ifelse(`Max2020 vs Current` > 0,
                  color_tile("green", "white")(`Max2020 vs Current`),
                  color_tile("red", "white")(`Max2020 vs Current`))
  ) %>%
  select(everything()) %>%
  kable(escape = F) %>%
  kable_styling("hover", full_width = F) %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "3cm")
```
